algorithm_technique: Identify the largest element, repeatedly increment it and add to the sum.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize score by repeatedly picking the largest element, removing it, and adding its incremented value.
problem_summary_technical: The optimal strategy is to always pick the maximum element, increment it, and add it to the score.
key_insights: The greedy approach of always picking the maximum element is optimal.
The sequence of picked numbers will be `max(nums), max(nums)+1, ..., max(nums)+k-1`.
The sum can be calculated using an arithmetic progression formula.
